abstract.t: This document defines the architecture of Netnews systems and specifies the correct manipulation and interpretation of Netnews articles by software which originates, distributes, stores, and displays them. It also specifies the requirements that must be met by any protocol used to transport and serve Netnews articles.Internet Draft Comments Comments are solicited and should be addressed to the Usenet Format Working Group at ietf-usefor@imc.org.
